body_html:
The error message is:

"The name 'HzfHomepageWnd/StatsAccumulatorfeature0/' refers to an Operation not in the graph."

'HzfHomepageWnd/StatsAccumulatorfeature0/' is generated by accumulator.

The error happens when you use SavedModelBuilder to save the trained model and then restore it using tf.saved_model.loader.

body:
The error message is:

> "The name 'HzfHomepageWnd/StatsAccumulatorfeature0/' refers to an Operation not in the graph."

`'HzfHomepageWnd/StatsAccumulatorfeature0/'` is generated by accumulator.

The error happens when you use `SavedModelBuilder` to save the trained model and then restore it using `tf.saved_model.loader`.
